title: Patch Notes
content: d the wrong subtitle showing up for one of Orin's lines at the Temple of Bhaal. Improved the fade-in and fade-out transitions for Wyll's Act III romance scene. Fixed Astarion looking like he's floating on steps and, separately, like he's frozen after the battle with the Netherbrain. Fixed a camera pop in the dialogue with Lorroakan at Sorcerous Sundries. Fixed Astarion's awkwardly long pause after he responds to you asking him if this is how he used to live, in reference to the spawn at Cazador'
